Headline: #67 67th-69th-71st Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 67th/St.Lawrence
ShortDescription: Eastbound 67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted via 67th, St.Lawrence, Marquette, Cottage, and 67th due to, street blockage near 67th/St.Lawrence.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted via 67th, St.Lawrence, Marquette, Cottage, and 67th due to, street blockage near 67th/St.Lawrence.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer on a train at Fullerton. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier sick customer on a train at Fullerton.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
